page.title: 16 Marine lake
page.content: the year 1937. On the 13th December 1982 a great storm damaged the sea wall which led to the demolishment of the colonade around the Marine lake and of the Rozel. Marine lake was built because if someone wanted to paddle and the sea was out they couldn't go for a paddle unless they walked for miles.Another reason they built Marine lake was if a person was swept out to sea he would surely die,but if he was swept out in Marine lake he could grab hold of the causeway and not be killed.That is why they built Marine lake.
